Projects Blog Reading List Say Hello

I am a data scientist based in the San Francisco Bay Area. By day, I work in the Utilities SaaS division at Oracle. By night, I volunteer with DataKind to provide pro bono data science services to mission-driven nonprofits.

I am an excitable nerd, and I ❤ open source software, science fiction, and coffee.
